TEXT.English: Administrative Center

TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pirs[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Zoroastrian Magu[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

TEXT.English: Zoroastrian Royal Fire
TEXT.Chinese: 祆教圣火

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Fire[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Fire[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Adur Farnbag
TEXT.Chinese: 法恩贝格圣火坛

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Adur Farnbag[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Adur Farnbag[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Weaver
TEXT.Chinese: Weaver

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Weavers[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cotton[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dye[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Weavers[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cotton[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dye[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Bath
TEXT.Chinese: 公共浴池

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baths[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output and add health to a city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baths[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output and add health to a city.

TEXT.English: Constabulary
TEXT.Chinese: Constabulary

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Constabularies[COLOR_REVERT] lower a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]War Weariness[COLOR_REVERT] and increase espionage significantly.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Constabularies[COLOR_REVERT] lower a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]War Weariness[COLOR_REVERT] and increase espionage significantly.

TEXT.English: Coffee House
TEXT.Chinese: Coffee House

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coffee Houses[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tabacco[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coffee Houses[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tabacco[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Post Office
TEXT.Chinese: Post Office

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Post Offices[COLOR_REVERT] provide an extra trade route and increase espionage.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Post Offices[COLOR_REVERT] provide an extra trade route and increase espionage.

TEXT.English: Wharf
TEXT.Chinese: Wharf

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] increase that city's income from trade routes, provide an experience bonus to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Naval Units[COLOR_REVERT] and increase that city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] resources. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharf[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Marco Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] increase that city's income from trade routes, provide an experience bonus to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Naval Units[COLOR_REVERT] and increase that city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] resources. TEXT.English: Civic Square
TEXT.Chinese: Civic Square

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Civic Squares[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Civic Squares[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate.

TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sewers[COLOR_REVERT] improve a city's health.

TEXT.English: Distillery
TEXT.Chinese: Distillery

TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Distilleries[COLOR_REVERT] increase the city's happiness and unhealthiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Banana[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Chinese: News Press

TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]News Presses[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate.

TEXT.English: Cinema

TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cinemas[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the happiness output.

TEXT.English: Hotel
TEXT.Chinese: Hotel

TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hotels[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase trade route yield and increase trade route yield even more for each level of culture.

TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parks[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness for each [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Town[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Chinese: Estate

TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estates[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output and allows you to hire a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

TEXT.English: Pharmacy
